item.title: By: Jessica
item.dc:creator: Jessica
item.description: I've been working on a novel for a while, and I keep forgetting to include any kind of religious belief in the world building. It's been driving me crazy... then it occurred to me that as an atheist, religious belief never occurs to me at all anyway, so no wonder I'm having trouble remembering to include it in my made-up world.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been working on a novel for a while, and I keep forgetting to include any kind of religious belief in the world building.
